title: Flowers at work. - 3rd edition.
brief_description: Illustrates the major parts of a flower and their functions. Demonstrates the process of pollination, methods of cross-pollination and shows a variety of flowers and the arrangement of their reproductive parts. Highlights the importance of hybridization to agriculture and horticulture.
